title: Grontardo
text:
Grontardo (<a href="Cremun%C3%A9s">Cremunés</a>: ) is a "<a href="comune">comune</a>" (municipality) in the <a href="Province%20of%20Cremona">Province of Cremona</a> in the <a href="Italy">Italian</a> region <a href="Lombardy">Lombardy</a>, located about southeast of <a href="Milan">Milan</a> and about northeast of <a href="Cremona">Cremona</a>.
The town has a <a href="San%20Basilio%2C%20Grontardo">parish church dedicated to San Basilio</a>.
Grontardo borders the following municipalities: <a href="Corte%20de%27%20Frati">Corte de' Frati</a>, <a href="Gabbioneta-Binanuova">Gabbioneta-Binanuova</a>, <a href="Gadesco-Pieve%20Delmona">Gadesco-Pieve Delmona</a>, <a href="Persico%20Dosimo">Persico Dosimo</a>, <a href="Pescarolo%20ed%20Uniti">Pescarolo ed Uniti</a>, <a href="Scandolara%20Ripa%20d%27Oglio">Scandolara Ripa d'Oglio</a>, <a href="Vescovato%2C%20Italy">Vescovato</a>.
